attributes.action: Ask the UN to prevent pregnancy in any country at war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Only countries not at war with open democratic court and government, should be allowed to have children thus lowering population globally   protecting our planet as well as preventing human suffering. Provide injections of hormones to girls from the age of puberty to prevent pregnancy, enforced by the United Nations, why not?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
